```{r , setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Graphing flags of the world in ggplot, because why not?  

# United States 

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 3, fig.width = 5}
l <- 140
h_lim <- l*(1/1.9)
union_l <- l*(.76/1.9)
union_h <- (h_lim - (l*(1/1.9) - (l*(1/1.9))*.5385)) - .54

star6_l <- union_l*(.063/.76)
star6_h <- union_h*(.054/.5385) 

line_seq <- seq(1, l*(1/1.9), length.out = 14)

tibble(x = 1:l, 
       y = 1:l) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point(col = "white") + 
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, h_lim)) + 
  # theme_void() + 
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[1], yend = line_seq[1], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[2], yend = line_seq[2], col = 'white') + 
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[3], yend = line_seq[3], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[4], yend = line_seq[4], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[5], yend = line_seq[5], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[6], yend = line_seq[6], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[7], yend = line_seq[7], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[8], yend = line_seq[8], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[9], yend = line_seq[9], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[10], yend = line_seq[10], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[11], yend = line_seq[11], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[12], yend = line_seq[12], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[13], yend = line_seq[13], col = 'white') +
  geom_segment(x = 1, xend = l, y = line_seq[14], yend = line_seq[14], col = 'white') +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[1], ymax = line_seq[2], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[3], ymax = line_seq[4], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[5], ymax = line_seq[6], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[7], ymax = line_seq[8], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[9], ymax = line_seq[10], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[11], ymax = line_seq[12], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = line_seq[13], ymax = line_seq[14], fill = "#BF0A30")) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 1, xmax = union_l, ymin = h_lim - union_h, ymax = h_lim), fill = "#002868") +
  # top row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*3,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*5,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*7,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*9,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*11,  y = h_lim - star6_h), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # second row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*2,  y = h_lim - star6_h*2), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*4,  y = h_lim - star6_h*2), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*6,  y = h_lim - star6_h*2), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*8,  y = h_lim - star6_h*2), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*10,  y = h_lim - star6_h*2), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # third row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l,  y = h_lim - star6_h*3), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*3,  y = h_lim - star6_h*3), col = "white", size = 3) +

  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*11,  y = h_lim - star6_h*3), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # fourth row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*2,  y = h_lim - star6_h*4), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*4,  y = h_lim - star6_h*4), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*6,  y = h_lim - star6_h*4), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*8,  y = h_lim - star6_h*4), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*10,  y = h_lim - star6_h*4), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # fifth row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*3,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*5,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*7,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*9,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*11,  y = h_lim - star6_h*5), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # sixth row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*2,  y = h_lim - star6_h*6), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*4,  y = h_lim - star6_h*6), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*6,  y = h_lim - star6_h*6), col = "white", size = 3) +

  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*10,  y = h_lim - star6_h*6), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # seventh row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*3,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*5,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*7,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*9,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*11,  y = h_lim - star6_h*7), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # eighth row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*2,  y = h_lim - star6_h*8), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*4,  y = h_lim - star6_h*8), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*6,  y = h_lim - star6_h*8), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*8,  y = h_lim - star6_h*8), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*10,  y = h_lim - star6_h*8), col = "white", size = 3) +
  # ninth row
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l,  y = h_lim - star6_h*9), col = "white", size = 3) +
  geom_point(aes(x = star6_l*3,  y = h_lim - star6_h*9), col = "white", size = 3) +

  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#BF0A30", "white")) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
```
